devdoc.author: rashtrakoff
devdoc.custom:experimental: This is an experimental contract/library. Use at your own risk.
devdoc.details: Contains functions for interacting with dHedge protocol pools

calcUserShare(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool s.details: Function to calculate share amount received corresponding to token amount invested

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it
params._withdraw: Boolean representing if the calculation should be done with respect to withdrawal

returns._0: User's share amount for an invested amount of a token As this function is used to update total share amount of a user when updating his/her flow, it is necessary to use a boolean depicting if the calculation is being done as a part of update flow or as part of withdrawable calculation. For withdrawable calculation, it will account for cooldown period.

calcUserUninvested(dHedgeStorage.dHedgeP.details: Function to calculate uninvested amount of a token streamed by a user

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

returns._0: User's uninvested amount of a token

calcWithdrawable(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePoo.details: Function to calculate withdrawable amount of a user

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

returns._0: Amount that can be fully withdrawn currently This function accounts for the cooldown period so, real withdrawable amount can differ according to the time of calling of this function.

deposit(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool storage.custom:note: Add code to collect fees later on.
deposit(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool storage.details: Function to deposit tokens into a dHedge pool

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

isDepositAsset(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool.details: Wrapper function to check if an asset is accepted as deposit asset in a dHedge pool

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it
params._token: Address of the token to be deposited

returns._0: Boolean representing the status of the token for deposition

moveLPT(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool storage.details: Function to move LP tokens to dHedgeBank contract in order to avoid timelock

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it Function should be directly callable by a dHedgeCore contract or owner of the contract

requireUpkeep(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool s.details: Function which checks if deposit function can be called or not

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

returns._0: boolean depicting need for upkeep This function is useful for on-chain keepers

withdrawLPT(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool sto.details: Function to withdraw a user's share of the pool

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to be withdrawn to user's address
params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

withdrawUninvestedAll(dHedgeStorage.dHed.details: Function to withdraw all uninvested assets/tokens of a user from the dHedgeCore contract

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

withdrawUninvestedSingle(dHedgeStorage.d.details: Function to withdraw some amount of an uninvested asset/token of a user

params._amount: Amount from uninvested amount to be withdrawn
params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

devdoc.title: dHedge helper library
